snippet.title: Crysis 2 'E3 2010 Trailer' TRUE-HD QUALITY
snippet.description:
►► Remember to select 720p HD◄◄
EA released this New trailer for Crysis 2 at E3 2010.
Platforms: Playstation 3, Xbox 360 & PC
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Developer: Crytek Studios
Genre:  First-Person Shooter
PEGI Rating: RP
Release Date:
US: Q4/2010
EU: Q4/2010
